H2.text: who ruled the ottoman empire in the 1500s. Mehmed II

H3.text: who ruled the ottoman empire in the 1500s. Selim I

A4.text: Suleiman also fought for years against the Shia Muslim Safavid Empire of Persia, and annexed Mesopotamia.

A5.text: Suleiman the Magnificent was the Ottoman sultan from 1520 till 1566.
